name: Decentralized CMO (Copyrights Management Org) for Music
description: Since 2014, the management of copyright in the EU has been formally freed from state monopolies. How can we design a distributed registry and payout system that harness web3 tech?

speakers.name: Matteo Alessio Tambussi
speakers.bio: Musician, Linguistic Passionate, Web3 educator and Project Dev.
